title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Articles on Preservation and Reuse
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Preservation     Articles on Preservation and Reuse                Articles on Preservation and Reuse      Park Newsletters Most of the features below were first published in NPS and park newsletters:    Spanning the Gap (STG 1985-2007) Guide to the Gap (GTG 2011-Present ) Cultural Resource Management Magazine (CRM)        Preservation of Historic Structures Isaac Van Campen Inn  STG: Summer 1983, Vol. 6, No. 2   Foster Armstrong House STG: Spring 1984, Vol. 7, No. 1  Designed with Nature: The Zimmermann Estate  STG: Summer 1991, Vol. 13, No. 2   Garris House: A Preservation Investigation STG: Summer 1995, Vol. 17, No. 2  Restoration at Millbrook Village: The Garis House STG: Fall 1999, Vol. 21, No. 3  Photo Gallery: Garis House STG: Fall 1999, Vol. 21, No. 3  Camp Staff Breathes New Life into Old Cabin CRM Magazine: Vol. 25, No. 3, P. 29, 2002  Preserving and Interpreting Historic Houses: VIPs Show the Way  CRM Magazine: Vol. 25, No. 3, P. 29, 2002  Cliff Park Inn Reopens STG: Fall/Winter 2004, Vol. 26, No. 2      Reuse of Historic Structures Barns: Survival of the Fittest  STG: Spring 1991, Vol. 13, No. 1  Preserving Walpack's Parsonage  STG: Spring 1993, Vol. 15, No. 1   Walpack and its Church  STG: Spring 1994, Vol. 16, No. 1   Separation of the Church from the State of Decay  STG: Spring 1996, Vol. 18, No. 1  View...tiful STG:Summer 1997, Vol. 19, No. 2  Welcome to Grey Towers STG: Fall 2001, Vol. 23, No. 3      Artifacts A Map of Millbrook's Past STG: Spring 1997, Vol. 19, No. 1      More structures are described under Places: Historic Structures | Places; Architectural Styles More artifacts are described under Collections: Artifacts and Preservation
